attributes.action: require local authorities to have suitable space for ballroom dancing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The health benefits of encouraging older people to continue dance are overwhelming. Not only this, but types of dance crosses all cultures and ought to be encouraged.
Across the country, former ballrooms have been converted into flats, offices or are due to be demolished. Places sometimes provided for dancing are frequently too small to allow proper ballroom dancing, although this has recently come back into fashion.
Blackpool has people coming from over the world, but older people like somewhere local they can dance regularly and so do the not not-so-young!
Please prevent the demolition of buildings which retain sprung dance floors which could be utilised and require local authorities to provide decent sized spaces where people can enjoy dancing for pleasure and fitness.
